dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1832 IH: To establish “Golden Sea Bream” as an acceptable market name for Stenotomus chrysops.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Magaziner introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To establish Golden Sea Bream as an acceptable market name for Stenotomus chrysops.

section.header: Golden Sea Bream as acceptable market name
section.text: A food shall not be treated as misbranded, adulterated, or otherwise in violation of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act (21 U.S.C. 301 et seq.) because the food is labeled or marketed using the name Golden Sea Bream for the species Stenotomus chrysops.
